text: Youngstown State University is a public university in Youngstown, Ohio. The university has about 15,194 students. It was founded in 1908. The current president of the university is Bill Johnson, a former member of the U.S. House of Representatives. ==Sports== The athletics teams of the university are called the Penguins. They have 16 varsity teams and they compete in the Horizon League and the Missouri Valley Football Conference for football. ==Other websites== *Youngstown State University's Official website *Youngstown State Penguins' Official athletics website Category:Horizon League Category:Missouri Valley Football Conference Category:Colleges and universities in Ohio Category:1908 establishments in the United States Category:1900s establishments in Ohio
title: Youngstown State University
